overview: Asgardian brothers Thor and Loki take a journey, by King Odinâ€™s command, to a distant land known as Utgard.  There they will meet obscure and fantastical beings, discover more about their universe, and take part in a daring, deadly, and totally entertaining gameshow.  These brothers go off on a quest, but find themselves face to face with the greatest challenge of their lifetimes.
tagline: A steampunk reimagining of a Norse myth
title: Utgard Loki
